ygData.subject: RE: WIS Item info
ygData.msgSnippet: *rustles through various tomes of lore* There isn t anything (commonly known) that grants more than +3 in the neck slot.  Checked EQlizer, EQItems and
ygData.messageBody:
*rustles through various tomes of lore*

There isn't anything (commonly known) that grants more than +3 in the neck
slot. Checked EQlizer, EQItems and Allakhazam. Keep looking though, and
let us know if you find anything.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason Harrell [SMTP:jharrell@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 3:10 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] WIS Item info
>
> From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>
>
> ok, and *NECK* item, greater than 3 Wis?
>
>
> ;-)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David [mailto:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 3:04 PM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] WIS Item info
>
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Also Ruined Circlet, on Goblin Preacher (rare drop) in Permafrost. +4/+4
> int/wis +some ac (I think 2 ac). BI Medallion is +3/+3 int/wis
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 2:58 PM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] WIS Item info
>
>
> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
> Blackened Medallion. Sells for 20-30pp on most servers. Found in
> Runnyeye.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Jason Harrell [SMTP:jharrell@...]
> > Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 2:59 PM
> > To: eqcheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: [EQCheats] WIS Item info
> >
> > Anyone know of a neck piece with > 3 Wisdom?
> >
> > Trajen D'Fraust
> > Barbarian Shaman - Innoruk
> > Lord of The Divinity - Order of Deus Vult.
